statements: DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM tests WHERE test_id = 100 AND result = 'Positive';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 200 AND birthdate < '1990-01-01';
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE test_id IN (SELECT test_id FROM test_results ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 101 AND condition = 'Fever';
DELETE FROM test_results WHERE test_name = 'Blood Test' AND appointment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM medical_history WHERE patient_id = 101 AND condition = 'Diabetes';
DELETE FROM medications WHERE dosage = '20 mg' AND frequency = 'daily';
